sanskrit_verse:
न हीदृशमनायुष्यं लोके किं चन विद्यते ।
यादृशं पुरुषस्येह परदारोपसेवनम् ॥ ४.१३४॥
transliteration:
na hīdṛśamanāyuṣyaṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyate |
yādṛśaṃ puruṣasyeha paradāropasevanam || 4.134||
sph_interpretive_translation: There exists no act in this world that diminishes life-force more than the violation of another's conjugal bond.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates from alignment with cosmic integrity
Capacity-based responsibility is determined by consciousness distortion
Restoration logic operates through completion of violated dharma-tattva
Consciousness alignment restores natural law when disrupted
executable_legal_axioms: IF an individual engages in violation of another’s marital sanctity THEN initiate immediate cessation protocol AND activate consciousness-realignment sequence
IF life-force depletion is detected due to relational transgression THEN deploy restorative resonance field until equilibrium restored
IF capacity for dharma-adherence is impaired THEN assign guided reintegration process under qualified supervision
IF societal harmony disruption occurs THEN execute systemic purification procedures aligned with Nyaya-based causality mapping
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, threshold of responsibility arises upon measurable disturbance in relational dharmic field. Authority lies not in punitive judgment but in calibrated restoration of energetic coherence. Hierarchy recognizes primacy of consciousness over conduct; hence, corrective measures precede structural interventions.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes clear causal link between violation of paradaara and depletion of life-force. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals sequential distortion in consciousness-field. Proportional response aligns with restoration of violated tattva without infliction of suffering. Non-punitive reality rule affirms correction through completion rather than condemnation.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate cessation of harmful pattern through vibrational realignment techniques
Assign completion process involving acknowledgment, restitution, and conscious reaffirmation of sacred boundaries
Deploy resonance healing to restore disrupted relational energy fields
Implement supervised integration period to rebuild trust and clarity within affected community structures
final_declaration: This ruling flows exclusively from the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority. Dharma stands restored through consciousness-aligned action. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates truth.
